item.title: links for 2008-04-24
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• PHP: mysql_real_escape_string - Manual
    Escapes special characters in the unescaped_string , taking into account the current character set of the connection so that it is safe to place it in a mysql_query(). If binary data is to be inserted, this function must be used. mysql_real_escape_str
    (tags: php programming security injection mysql)
